title: Old Fashioned Hard Candy Sticks - Sour Strawberry: 80-Piece Box
features: Box contains 80 Sour Strawberry Gilliam Old Fashioned Hard Candy Sticks.
Stick Specifications- Net Weight: 0.5 Ounce Length: 5 Inches Diameter: 1/4 Inch
description: Ask any farmer and they’ll tell you, "When strawberries are sour they haven’t ripened to their fullest potential." Well, these sour strawberry hard candy sticks will prove that theory wrong. Pulled from the richest sugar soil, these red striped canes have reached maturity. With one bite revealing the sweat and sour flavor, you’ll know it’s true. Share these hard candy sticks at your next event, guests will marvel at the new discovery
